Other Information

Manufacturer

Airbus

The A330-300 is the first A330 that was developed.

Trivia

  • The -100,-400,-500, and -600 were unsold variants of the A330 family, due to lack of interest from airlines.
  • An A330-300 that was written off as a loss is now a museum with various planes and relics. It is located in Nepal.
